name: Adobo Chicken
instructions: 1. In a pot, combine chicken, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, and peppercorns.
2. Marinate for at least 30 minutes.
3. Simmer over low heat until chicken is tender and sauce is reduced.
4. Heat oil in a skillet and brown the chicken pieces.
5. Serve hot with rice.

name: Lechon Kawali
instructions: 1. Score pork belly skin with a sharp knife and rub with salt and pepper.
2. Place pork belly in a pot and add enough water to cover.
3. Simmer until pork is tender and water has evaporated.
4. Heat oil in a deep frying pan and fry pork until skin is crispy and golden brown.
5. Slice and serve with a dipping sauce of vinegar, soy sauce, and minced garlic.

name: Ginataang Kalabasa at Sitaw
instructions: 1. In a pan, sauté garlic and onion until soft.
2. Add shrimp and cook until pink.
3. Pour coconut milk into the pan and bring to a simmer.
4. Add squash and cook until tender.
5. Add string beans and cook until both vegetables are done.
6. Season with fish sauce and pepper.
7. Serve hot with rice.

name: Chicken Tinola
instructions: 1. In a pot, sauté ginger, garlic, and onion until fragrant.
2. Add chicken pieces and cook until slightly browned.
3. Pour water into the pot and bring to a boil.
4. Add fish sauce and simmer until chicken is tender.
5. Add green papaya and cook until soft.
6. Stir in chili leaves or spinach.
7. Season with salt and pepper.
8. Serve hot.

name: Bicol Express
instructions: 1. In a pan, sauté garlic and onion until soft.
2. Add pork belly slices and cook until browned.
3. Pour coconut milk into the pan and bring to a simmer.
4. Stir in shrimp paste according to taste.
5. Add long green chili peppers and cook until pork is tender.
6. Serve hot with rice.

name: Lumpiang Shanghai
instructions: 1. In a bowl, mix together ground pork, carrots, onion, and garlic.
2. Season with salt and pepper.
3. Wrap the mixture in spring roll wrappers, sealing the edges with beaten egg.
4. Heat oil in a pan and fry the spring rolls until golden brown and crispy.
5. Drain on paper towels.
6. Serve hot with sweet chili sauce for dipping.

name: Fried fish
instructions: 1. Wash and clean the fish.
2. Place a pan on the stove and heat it up.
3. Put oil in the pan and heat it up.
4. Place the fish in the pan and cook until done.
5. You can now serve and eat it.
